summary: Makes distance glacier textures look less ugly. 2/1k.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]What is This?[/size][/color]
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This mod makes distance glaciers look less ugly. It is 2/1k quality and there wont be 4 or 8k quality of it since this is just a damn lod texture.[/size]
lol
[/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]How to Install?[/size][/color][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]Automatically with manager or manually dragging it to your data folder.[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=5]Q&A
[/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=5]Q:[/size] [size=3]Will this effect my REAL ICE?[/size]
[size=5]A:[/size][size=3] No it wont. Lod textures are distance textures you see so any texture mod you use wont get effect with lod texture.[/size][/font]
author: ProtologolusX
